game.name: The Path Home
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "The Path Home" is a 2D pixel-art puzzle game where you explore a strange world with a girl. Use panels to "flip" black and white tiles and reshape the puzzle world. The girl always searches for the "shortest path to the goal," but avoiding fake goals and reuniting her with the crow is up to you.
